bridge-type.label: DigitalSTROM Server

parameter.name: applicationToken
parameter.label: Application-Token
parameter.description: The application token to authentificate to the DigitalSTROM-Server.

parameter.name: userName
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Name of a registered DigitalSTROM user to autentificate to the DigitalSTROM-Server.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password of a registered digitalStrom user to autentificate to the DigitalSTROM-Server.

parameter.name: dSID
parameter.label: DigitalSTROM-Sever ID
parameter.description: The unique identifier of a DigitalSTOM-Severs.

parameter.name: dsName
parameter.label: Name of the DigitalSTROM installation
parameter.description: The user defined name of the DigitalStrom installation.

parameter.name: sensorDataUpdateIntervall
parameter.label: Sensor update interval
parameter.description: Seceonds after the DigitalSTROM device sensor data is updated.

parameter.name: defaultTrashBinDeleateTime
parameter.label: Days to be slaked Trashbin devices
parameter.description: Days after the temporary saved DigitalSTROM device configuration from deleted things get permanently deleted.

parameter.name: trustCertPath
parameter.label: Path to the SLL Certificate
parameter.description: Here you can specify the path to the SLL certificate for the DigitalSTROM-Server. You can download it from DigitalSTROM server.
